Package de.espirit.firstspirit.access.project

Interface MediaConstraints

  • public interface MediaConstraints
    Project Media-Constraints settings. project level based media restrictions based on file size and/or file extension.
    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Set<String> getAllowedExtensions()
      Get the allowed file name extensions.
      long getMaxFileSize()
      Get the project wide maximum file size for non image files in byte.
      long getMaxImageSize()
      Get the project wide maximum image size setting in byte.
      void setAllowedExtensions​(Set<String> value)
      Set the allowed file name extensions.
      void setMaxFileSize​(long value)
      Set the project wide maximum file size setting for non image files in byte.
      void setMaxImageSize​(long value)
      Set the project wide maximum image(file) size setting in byte.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxFileSize

        long getMaxFileSize()
        Get the project wide maximum file size for non image files in byte.
        Returns:
        the maximum size for files (non image files) in byte or -1 if no limit is set
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        Project.isMediaSizeLimitEnabled(), Project.setMediaSizeLimitEnabled(boolean), setMaxFileSize(long)

      • setMaxFileSize

        void setMaxFileSize​(long value)
        Set the project wide maximum file size setting for non image files in byte.
        Parameters:
        value - the maximum file size in byte
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        getMaxFileSize()

      • getMaxImageSize

        long getMaxImageSize()
        Get the project wide maximum image size setting in byte.
        Returns:
        the max size for image files in byte or -1 if no limit is set
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        Project.isMediaSizeLimitEnabled(), Project.setMediaSizeLimitEnabled(boolean), setMaxImageSize(long)

      • setMaxImageSize

        void setMaxImageSize​(long value)
        Set the project wide maximum image(file) size setting in byte.
        Parameters:
        value - in byte
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        getMaxImageSize()

      • getAllowedExtensions

        Set<String> getAllowedExtensions()
        Get the allowed file name extensions. The returned set is read only. The file name extensions check is case-sensitive.
        Returns:
        the Set containg all allowed file name extensions
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        setAllowedExtensions(java.util.Set), Project.isMediaExtensionCheckEnabled(), Project.setMediaExtensionCheckEnabled(boolean)

      • setAllowedExtensions

        void setAllowedExtensions​(Set<String> value)
        Set the allowed file name extensions. The provided set is copied.
        Enable by setting Project.setMediaExtensionCheckEnabled(boolean) to true. The file name extensions check is case-sensitive.
        Parameters:
        value - a set containing the fileName extensions
        Since:
        4.1
        See Also:
        getAllowedExtensions()
